name: Moon Drake
description: The Moon Drake is a medium-sized dragon that showcases dynamic abilities correlated with lunar phases. It has a robust build with notable attributes of Dexterity and Constitution.
memorable: Its power fluctuates with the moon phases, making it a unique challenge.
goals: The Moon Drake is known for its therapeutic role in curing afflicted lycanthropes.
relations: May relate to other lycanthropes and various magical creatures.
environment: Typically found in places with significant lunar visibility.
strengths: High Dexterity and the ability to become incorporeal.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to damage under a new moon phase.
attacks: The Moon Drake can bite to inflict piercing and radiant damage, while its claws deal slashing damage. It also has special lycanthropy-related attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Lunarbeam, exhaling radiant damage in a wide line potentially affecting shapechangers.
senses: The drake has darkvision with a range of 120 feet and a passive perception of 14.
skills: Proficient in Arcana and Insight, showcasing knowledge and perception.
additional_information: Curative Saliva can cure afflicted lycanthropes instantly.
Moonbound ability alters resistance and damage output based on lunar phases.
Can revert shapechangers back to their true form with radiant damage.
Incorporates an incorporeal form to resist physical attacks.
Can pass through transparent objects while incorporeal.
